nodes.text: Battle of Borleias was a holodocumentary about the Siege of Borleias during the Yuuzhan Vong War. Narrated by Wolam Tser and recorded by Tam Elgrin, the holo portrayed the forces under General Wedge Antilles—and the rest of the New Republic Defense Force in general—in a positive manner, boosting the sagging morale that the New Republic had experienced during the Battle of Coruscant. The holo was a huge success, and helped increase enlistment in the Defense Force.
